class_notes: Contact Bumyong Choi (bumyongchoi@emory.edu) for permission to enroll.
course_description: This course is designed for those who have taken KRN 201 or have an equivalent level of proficiency. The course focuses on expanding conversational skills with an emphasis on Korean culture and society.
